title: Hour 3 - Ben Golliver and Bill Shakin (07-30-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Ben Golliver and Bill Shakin (07-30-20)
description:
Ben Golliver says the Zion question is a strange situation. Ben Says the Pelicans will be extra careful with Zion because they have so much invested in him. Bill Shakin says the Dodgers were not thrilled to have Joe Kelly suspended. Bill says the Dodgers don't feel the Astros showed enough remorse for the cheating scandal. Bill says the Dodgers are not going to forget what happened.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
